Entry.Name: Debuggable Application
Entry.Description: By enabling the DEBUG mode, an malicious user is able to instrument and take control of the app by overcoming its security controls.

Mitigation.Textual: Please set the debuggable flag to FALSE within the AndroidManifest.xml file.
Mitigation.Code Snippet:
1. Open an IDE (e.g., Android Studio);
2. Search for the 'android:debuggable='true'' in the AndroidManifest.xml file;
3. Replace the 'true' value with 'false'.
